Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.GameMap
public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
Brief Class that represents the map and includes game map logic related to insertion and removals of workers or buildings on particular tiles identified via position's coordinates

      public void setCell​(Cell cell, Position position)

    • buildNextLevel

      public java.lang.Boolean buildNextLevel​(Position position)
      Brief This functions automatically generates the next Block to be built on the given Cell and pushes it, except if a Dome has already been built on the Cell
      Parameters:
      position - is the position of the Cell
      Returns:
      true if the Block has been successfully built

    • addGameObject

      public java.lang.Boolean addGameObject​(GameObject gameObject, Position position) throws IncorrectBlockTypeException
      Brief adds a GameObject on a Cell at a certain position and deletes from allowedPositions if it is invoked during setup
      Parameters:
      gameObject - is the object to add
      position - is the Cell's position
      Returns:
      true if the object gets placed correctly, else false
      Throws:
      IncorrectBlockTypeException - if the block trying to be pushed doesn't follow the correct building order

    • move

      public java.lang.Boolean move​(Position from, Position to) throws OutOfBoundsException, SamePositionException
      Brief moves a GameObject from the Cell 'from' to the Cell 'to'
      Parameters:
      from - is the position of the initial Cell
      to - is the position of the Cell the GameObject is being moved to
      Returns:
      true if the GameObject can perform the movement, otherwise false
      Throws:
      OutOfBoundsException - if 'from' is an incorrect Position
      SamePositionException - if 'to' is equal to 'from'

    • getDefaultWidth

      public static java.lang.Integer getDefaultWidth()

    • getDefaultHeight

      public static java.lang.Integer getDefaultHeight()

    • checkMove

      public java.lang.Boolean checkMove​(Position initial, Position destination)
      Brief Checks if a GameObject can move from a position at a certain level to a destination with a given level
      Parameters:
      initial - is the position of the Cell the GameObject is moving from
      destination - is the position of the destination Cell
      Returns:
      true if destination's level is lower, equal or at max one higher than initial's position and hasn't a worker or a dome on top of it

    • isWithinGrid

      private static java.lang.Boolean isWithinGrid​(Position position)
      Brief checks if the coordinates of the Cell are within the board
      Parameters:
      position - is the position to control
      Returns:
      true if the position is within the board

    • getValidDestinations

      public java.util.ArrayList<Position> getValidDestinations​(Position position)
      Brief returns an arrayList of the Positions on the board accessible to a Worker on the Cell in position
      Parameters:
      position - is the initial position from which a Worker is to be moved
      Returns:
      the arrayList of accessible Positions

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getReachablePositions

      public java.util.ArrayList<Position> getReachablePositions​(Position position)
      Brief Checks all the neighboring cells without a Dome on top or not occupied by a Worker
      Parameters:
      position - is the Worker's position around which the method analyzes the unoccupied positions
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of unoccupied positions

    • getBackwardsPosition

      public static Position getBackwardsPosition​(Position origin, Position destination)
      Brief Checks if there's a position in the map on the same direction of the two positions passed to the function
      Parameters:
      origin - origin position
      destination - destination position
      Returns:
      the position (if exists in the map) straight backwards the destination, otherwise null
